episodes.title: Raised in a Cult. Rebuilt Through Art.
episodes.description:
In this powerful and candid episode Vudu Dahl opens up about her life as a cult survivor raised in the “House of Maro,” and how she began her healing journey through s*x work, kink therapy, and somatic healing. From escaping abuse to becoming a kink educator and running her er*tic wellness brand Dalier, she shares her inspiring path toward personal liberation and emotional healing.

We’ve dropped the masks, but kept the raw, unfiltered vibe. The Unmasked Project is the evolution of our show—still hosted by Brian and Layla, still diving deep into intimacy, identity, and human connection. Only now, we’re going even deeper. Same bold energy. New name. Fully unmasked.

🔥 Bonus footage in Discord: https://discord.com/invite/TPBUgSxzwb
🌶️ Products we love: https://www.themaskedswingers.com/products-we-love

⏰ Timestamps:

00:00 – Welcome & rebranding to The Unmasked Project
01:30 – Introducing Vudu Dahl: cult survivor turned kink educator
06:03 – Life in the cult & control dynamics (cult story, cultural trauma)
09:04 – Isolation, homeschooling & early questioning
12:06 – Groomed for servitude: early childhood lessons (consent education, female empowerment)
14:01 – Deciding to escape: signs of abuse & questioning authority
18:05 – Exit strategy, emotional fallout & being ostracized
25:00 – Struggle after escape: abusive relationship & rediscovering autonomy
32:00 – First forays into s*x work & kink therapy: reclaiming power
37:04 – Navigating identity, trauma & dangerous patterns
43:06 – The first play party & introduction to BDS* consent
45:12 – How kink therapy and BDS* consent rules helped her heal
49:00 – Defining boundaries, aftercare, and community building
52:00 – Launch of Dalier: combining s*xual healing, somatic therapy, and empowerment tools
56:00 – Why trauma-informed kink matters & intro to somatic release
58:00 – Lighthearted Rants: bo*ty preferences & Uber pet peeves 😅
1:02:00 – Final thoughts on somatic release, therapy techniques, and taking control of your body

🔗 Want more Vudu?
